body_content.explanation: a musical instrument with many strings from Ukraine:
examples: He plays the 57-stringed Ukrainian instrument known as the bandura, similar to a zither.
A second-generation Ukrainian living in New York, he is a superb bandura player.

body_content.explanation: the style of Ukrainian music played on the bandura, often by members of a choir (= a group of singers) who sing and play at the same time:
examples: One can still enjoy listening to bandura live.
The composer blends modern music with the sorrowful sounds of Ukrainian bandura choirs.
